channel.title: Banco Bradesco on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Banco Bradesco on FinanClub

item.title: 1174 BBD
item.description: score:1174 Chances: Amazon.com will launch a credit card offering in Brazil in partnership with Banco Bradesco SA, expanding the bank’s fintech offering. Banco Bradesco expects bankrupt retailer Americanas SA and its lenders to reach a reasonable deal on debts, potentially resolving a financial issue.
